metadata.name: AI MetaChip: Gen-1
metadata.description: Enter the age of technological singularity with the arrival of the AI MetaChip NFT collection. Unite this otherworldly technology with MetaBlaze NFT characters to activate the all-knowing Galaxian Guideâ€”an AI-powered chatbot crafted to guide players through the enigmatic challenges of Galaxia Blue. Experience a cosmic fusion of AI and Blockchain technology with the AI MetaChip collection featuring 1,000 NFTs powered by MetaBlaze.
